summary: Some time in the future, East and West have stopped maintaining standing armies and nuclear weapons. Instead, to settle their differences they pit different teams of crack combat specialists against each other.
cast: Arthur Pentelow|Frederick Danner|Hans Bendrik|Daniel Harle|Hans Berger|Rosario Gianetti|Tim Yum|Kenneth Lo|Björn Franzen|Christer Gynge|Jürgen Schilling|Stefan Dillan|Ugo Chiari|Chandrakant Desai|George Harris|Jeremy Child|Erich Stering|Jean-Pierre Delamour|Richard Friday|Roy Scammell|J.Z. Kennedy|Terry Whitmore|Eberhard Fehmers|Keith Bradfield|Pik Sen Lim|To Van Minh
title: Gladiatorerna
